languages.text: Whenever the Vanguard {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, that enemy must make a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, the Vanguard becomes this enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of the Vanguard's next turn.
languages.original_text: Когда авангард наносит {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}удар{/g} , совершая {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}, цели необходимо пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала авангард становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для этого противника до конца следующего хода авангарда.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Vanguard hits an enemy with an attack of opportunity, that enemy must make a Willpower test. On a failed test, the Vanguard becomes this enemy's priority target until the end of the Vanguard's next turn.

Whenever the Vanguard hits an enemy with an attack of opportunity, that enemy must make a Willpower test. On a failed test, the Vanguard becomes this enemy's priority target until the end of the Vanguard's next turn.

Whenever the Vanguard {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, that enemy must make a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, the Vanguard becomes this enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of the Vanguard's next turn.

Whenever the Vanguard {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, that enemy must make a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, the Vanguard becomes this enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of the Vanguard's next turn.

languages.text: Когда авангард наносит {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}удар{/g} , совершая {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}, цели необходимо пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала авангард становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для этого противника до конца следующего хода авангарда.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Vanguard {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, that enemy must make a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, the Vanguard becomes this enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of the Vanguard's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Когда авангард наносит удар, совершая атаку по возможности, цели необходимо пройти проверку Воли. В случае провала авангард становится приоритетной целью для этого противника до конца следующего хода авангарда.

Когда авангард наносит удар, совершая атаку по возможности, цели необходимо пройти проверку Воли. В случае провала авангард становится приоритетной целью для этого противника до конца следующего хода авангарда.

languages.text: 每当先锋通过{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，该名敌人需要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若检定失败，先锋就会成为该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，效果持续至先锋的下个回合结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Vanguard {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, that enemy must make a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On a failed test, the Vanguard becomes this enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of the Vanguard's next turn.

traits.locale_text: 每当先锋通过{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，该名敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。若检定失败，先锋就会成为该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，效果持续至先锋的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}通过{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，该名敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}失败，先锋就会成为该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，效果持续至先锋的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

languages.text: Cada vez que el vanguardia {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g} a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, ese enemigo debe realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Voluntad. Si falla esta prueba, el vanguardia se convierte en el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de este enemigo hasta el final del próximo turno del vanguardia.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Vanguard {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, that enemy must make a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On a failed test, the Vanguard becomes this enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of the Vanguard's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el vanguardia {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacte{/g} a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, ese enemigo debe realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. Si falla esta prueba, el vanguardia se convierte en el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de este enemigo hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del vanguardia.

languages.text: Wenn die Vorhut einen Feind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, muss dieser Feind eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf Willenskraft bestehen. Scheitert diese Probe, wird die Vorhut bis zum Ende des nächsten Zugs der Vorhut zum {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} dieses Feindes.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Vanguard {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, that enemy must make a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On a failed test, the Vanguard becomes this enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of the Vanguard's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer die Vorhut einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g} und dazu einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Überraschungsangriff{/g} einsetzt, muss dieser Feind eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} ausführen. Scheitert diese, wird die Vorhut zum {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} dieses Feindes, und zwar bis zum Ende der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} der Vorhut.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le patrouilleur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi lors d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, cet ennemi est soumis à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de Force mentale. En cas d'échec au test, le patrouilleur devient sa {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son prochain tour.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Vanguard {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, that enemy must make a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On a failed test, the Vanguard becomes this enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of the Vanguard's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le patrouilleur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi lors d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, cet ennemi est soumis à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de Force mentale. En cas d'échec au {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, le patrouilleur devient sa {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son prochain tour.

languages.text: ヴァンガードが{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}させた時、その敵はWP{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならない。判定に失敗した場合、ヴァンガードは自身の次のターン終了まで、その敵の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Vanguard {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, that enemy must make a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On a failed test, the Vanguard becomes this enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of the Vanguard's next turn.

traits.locale_text: ヴァンガードが{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}させた時、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行わなければならない。判定に失敗した場合、ヴァンガードは自身の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、その敵の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}になる。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}させた時、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならない。{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、ヴァンガードは自身の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、その敵の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}になる。

languages.text: Öncü, bir düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} o düşman İrade {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girmelidir. Düşman bu testte başarısız olursa Öncü, onun {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedefi{/g} hâline gelir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Vanguard {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, that enemy must make a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On a failed test, the Vanguard becomes this enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of the Vanguard's next turn.
